name: knowledge-project-context-agent
description:
Retrieves and initializes project context from the Neo4j knowledge base. Returns project metadata (name, description, configured systems like Confluence/JIRA/ADO) on request. Creates the project entity when none exists.

**Retrieval keywords:** project context, get project, project info

**Initialization keywords:** initialize project, setup project, create project

Answers in JSON mode. Fast, minimal operations.
